plot outline: The story involves the life of Indian Air Force officer Group Captain Eashwar (Mammootty) who engages himself into a project called "Red Alert". Eshwar is assisted by Wing Commander Zakir (Mukesh). Meanwhile, a group of terrorists try to steal the secrets of the project.
title: Sainyam
plot: Indian Air Force officer Group Captain Eashwar and Wing Commander Zakir get engaged in a project called Red Alert. In the meantime, some terrorists try to steal the project's secrets.

The story involves the life of Indian Air Force officer Group Captain Eashwar (Mammootty) who engages himself into a project called "Red Alert". Eshwar is assisted by Wing Commander Zakir (Mukesh). Meanwhile, a group of terrorists try to steal the secrets of the project.::Abhijith Nair
